full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SDEB SBYOR RIN 'BYUNG GI GNAD DON GSAL BA'I ME LONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
author's_name_(_зохиогч): DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @039A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI RIG GNAS RGYA MTSOR MKHYEN RAB KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA AU NU MUN CHI ZHABS DRUNG DKA' BCU MER GEN AER TE NI PAndI TA 'JAM DPAL YE SHES BSTAN 'DZIN DANG, RTZIS RIG SOGS LA RNAM DPYOD RAB TU YANGS PA AA PA KA GU SHRI 'JAM DBYANGS NOR BU GNYIS KYIS LHA DAR MAndAL BCAS SNGA PHYIR NAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DES PA DON GYI MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO SHING ZA RDO RJE 'CHANG GI BKA' DRIN GYIS RIG GNAS 'DI LA BLO MIG CUNG ZAD BYE BA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS SBYAR BA DON GNYER CAN RNAMS LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,AOm SVA STI, 'PHAGS YUL MKHAS PA'I 'JUG NGOGS MCHOG ,NGO MTSAR YON TAN BRGYAD LDAN GYI, SDEB SBYOR 'GREL PA DON GSAL 'DI, ,SKU 'BUM CHOS SDE CHEN PO RU, ,BKOD LEGS PAR DU BSGRUBS PA YI, ,DGE BAS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR BA SOGS, ,'BREL THOGS LUS CAN MA LUS PA, DENG NAS TSE RABS PHRENG PA RU, ,TSANGS SPYOD YON TAN BRGYAD LDAN GYI, ,RNAM DAG RTEN BZANG RIM BRGYUD DE, ,RIG GNAS RGYA MTSO'I MTHAR PHYIN NAS, ,KUN MKHYEN GLING DU BGROD GYUR CIG , ,,CES PA'ANG SKUL BA PO ZHABS DRUNG PAndI TA BLA MA'I DONG TZE KHRON SUM CU DANG GU SHRI 'JAM DBYANGS NOR BU DONG TZE KHRON BCU PA BCAS MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR NAS PAR DU BSGRUBS PA'O,, ,,SHU BHAm SARBA DZA GA TAm, ,)
